channel.title: introspections on Bits of Insight
channel.description: Recent content in introspections on Bits of Insight

item.title: On Being Slow
item.description: A colleague told me about two types of processors Internal Processor: A person who gives one clear statement – externally; formulates what to say, makes corrections to it, etc. – internally External Processor: A person who does all the above externally I’ve been an external processor mostly. I think I’ve to slow down; I’m clumsy and fast under-the-hood. I’m an impulsive person; judgemental too. I work intuitively; deliberate, thought-through actions are a rarity.
